message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
I'm really interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that $14000 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $15500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $15500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14500 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. However, I'm still willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $15000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your final offer, but $15000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I'm surprised you're willing to go down to $13500, Bob. However, I'm not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $15000 and $13500. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14250. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $14250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. This is my final offer.
